statements: SELECT * FROM ThreatData;
SELECT threat_name, threat_type FROM ThreatData WHERE threat_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT threat_name, threat_description FROM ThreatData WHERE threat_type = 'Malware' ORDER BY threat_date DESC;
SELECT threat_name, threat_type, threat_date FROM ThreatData WHERE threat_description LIKE '%ransomware%';
SELECT * FROM ThreatData ORDER BY threat_type ASC, threat_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM ThreatData WHERE threat_type = 'Malware' ORDER BY threat_date DESC;
SELECT threat_name, threat_description FROM ThreatData WHERE threat_date >= '2021-01-01' AND threat_date <= '2021-12-31';
SELECT threat_id, threat_name, threat_type FROM ThreatData WHERE threat_description LIKE '%attack%';
SELECT threat_id, threat_date FROM ThreatData WHERE threat_name = 'Ransomware' AND threat_type = 'Critical' ORDER BY threat_date ASC;
SELECT COUNT(threat_id) AS total_threats, AVG(threat_date) AS avg_date FROM ThreatData WHERE threat_type = 'Phishing';
SELECT * FROM threats WHERE threat_type = 'Malware';
SELECT threat_name, threat_type FROM threats WHERE threat_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT threat_name, threat_type, threat_date FROM threats ORDER BY threat_date DESC;
SELECT pattern_name, pattern_description, pattern_severity FROM attack_patterns WHERE pattern_severity > 7;
SELECT * FROM threats INNER JOIN attack_patterns ON threats.threat_id = attack_patterns.pattern_id;
SELECT * FROM threats WHERE threat_type='Phishing';
SELECT threat_name, threat_date FROM threats WHERE threat_date > '2021-06-01';
SELECT pattern_name, pattern_severity FROM attack_patterns WHERE pattern_severity > 7;
SELECT * FROM threats JOIN attack_patterns ON threats.threat_id = attack_patterns.pattern_id;
SELECT threat_name, pattern_name FROM threats, attack_patterns WHERE threats.threat_type='Malware' AND attack_patterns.pattern_severity < 5;
SELECT * FROM ThreatData;
SELECT threat_id, threat_type, threat_description FROM ThreatData WHERE threat_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT pattern_name, pattern_description FROM ThreatPatterns ORDER BY pattern_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM CyberAttacks WHERE attack_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';

SELECT threat_id, threat_type, attack_description FROM ThreatData JOIN ThreatPatterns ON ThreatData.threat_id = ThreatPatterns.threat_id JOIN CyberAttacks ON ThreatPatterns.pattern_id = CyberAttacks.pattern_id;
SELECT * FROM ThreatData WHERE threat_type = 'Malware' AND threat_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT threat_id, threat_type FROM ThreatData ORDER BY threat_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM ThreatData INNER JOIN ThreatPatterns ON ThreatData.threat_id = ThreatPatterns.threat_id WHERE pattern_name = 'Ransomware';
SELECT * FROM CyberAttacks WHERE attack_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY attack_date ASC;
SELECT pattern_name, COUNT(*) AS num_attacks FROM ThreatPatterns INNER JOIN CyberAttacks ON ThreatPatterns.pattern_id = CyberAttacks.pattern_id GROUP BY pattern_name HAVING num_attacks > 3;
SELECT * FROM Threats;
SELECT threat_name, threat_type FROM Threats ORDER BY threat_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Incidents WHERE incident_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT DISTINCT attacker_type FROM Attackers;
SELECT attack_details FROM Attacks WHERE attack_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28';
SELECT * FROM Threats WHERE threat_name = 'Malware'
SELECT * FROM Threats ORDER BY threat_date DESC
SELECT incident_details FROM Incidents WHERE incident_date >= '2022-01-01' AND incident_date <= '2022-06-30'
SELECT attacker_name, attacker_type FROM Attackers WHERE attacker_type = 'Hacker'
SELECT incident_id, attack_date FROM Attacks JOIN Incidents ON Attacks.incident_id = Incidents.incident_id
SELECT * FROM ThreatActors;
SELECT name, description FROM AttackVectors WHERE threat_actor_id = 1;
SELECT id, date, description FROM Attacks WHERE target_id = 5 ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT name, description FROM Targets WHERE name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT id, summary FROM IncidentReports WHERE date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM ThreatActors WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, description FROM AttackVectors WHERE threat_actor_id = 2 ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT id, name FROM Targets WHERE id > 3 AND description LIKE '%critical%';
SELECT * FROM Attacks JOIN AttackVectors ON Attacks.attack_vector_id = AttackVectors.id WHERE date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY date ASC;

SELECT IncidentReports.id, date, summary, AttackVectors.name FROM IncidentReports JOIN Attacks ON IncidentReports.attack_id = Attacks.id JOIN AttackVectors ON Attacks.attack_vector_id = AttackVectors.id ORDER BY date DESC;
